library-chatbot.name: Library website with AI chatbot
library-chatbot.des: A library website which allows user to register, borrow books and reserve seat from the library. AI chatbot technology applied to guide user.

dashboard-chatbot.name: Dashboard with AI chatbot
dashboard-chatbot.des: A dashboard that performs graphs of data provided by user, together with a Rasa chatbot framework to guide user while using the dashboard.
